::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus turns to Windlord.

Rodimus: How are you old friend. This is like a reunion here. I was just being informed on our new Decepticon buddy. We're waiting for an official briefing to be ordered.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nightlight:
 
 Nightlight didnt say nothing and tought thzt Elita shouldnt know 
 about what is going on. Elita was drinking her shake without 
 interest and looking the adult trying to find out what's goin on.
 
 Windlord just awoke and looked to all around and said "Have I miss 
 something?"
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus heald his wife tightly and close.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Calm yourself. You're ok and thats what matters. New 
 Decepticons, hunting for me or the Matrix. Things always seem to 
 return to the past.
 > 
 > Rodimus turns to the doorway.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Kup! I think we need to talk now!
 > 
 > Kup comes back with Elita and her shake.
 > 
 > Kup: I'll assume that Nightlight told you about what happened. We 
 really need to have this briefing.
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:                                  Elita:
 >  
 >  Elita sighed and followed Kup
 >  
 >  Nighlight waited until her daugther have left the room and she 
 said 
 >  while her voice tembled "He comes to kill you..."
 >  
 >  Nightlight told ROdimus how the help signal was picked up and how 
 >  She and the other Pacificus MAximals went to help, that Windlord 
 >  arrived first and took Kup to their old maximal base. How she 
 left 
 >  behind the other maximals and how Jhiaxus found her inside her 
 old 
 >  home, and his comments about the new Decepticons generation, 
 >  mentioning too that she pretended to be fool in order get some 
 time 
 >  and let the others arrive for help her or convince the decepticon 
 >  that she was useless and then he left her alone; after a brief 
 >  pause, she mentioned that Jhiaxus asked abour Rodimus's location 
 and 
 >  how his sudden kind tone started to scared her.
 >  
 >  "Then I decided to lie and denied to know where are you... Also I 
 >  didnt tell him who was me... I couldn't warn you" said softly the 
 >  femme.
 >  
 >  In few words, Nighlight mention that Jhiaxus have told something 
 >  about the matrix. After a brief pause, NIghtlight narrated that 
 >  Jhiaxus started to loose his patient and becomes less kind; but 
 she 
 >  didnt say about that the Deception Lord have tratened with his 
 >  weapon, the femme was afraid that Rodimus with anger tried to 
 find 
 >  Jhiaxus.
 >  
 >  "Then after he tought that I dont know nothing about where are 
 >  you... He shot me... I was able to cover me with my wings... but 
 we 
 >  started to fight, I was forced to... minutes later Salveo, 
 Windlord 
 >  and kup arrived... That's all"said the femme
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::::
 >  > 
 >  > Rodimus caught onto the gesture.
 >  > 
 >  > Rodimus: Kup, could you take Elita to get a energon shake? I 
 >  believe there is a replicator down the hall a bit.
 >  > 
 >  > Kup: Sure, Rodimus. C'mon, lass. I know you want a shake.
 >  > 
 >  > Kup leads her down the hall to the replicator.
 >  > 
 >  > Rodimus: What is it, Nightlight?
 >  > 
 >  > 
 >  >
